TextView.android:text: Food = 1 Bowl fruits, pure dark chocolate
Food = Strawberries with Yoghurt,Sunflower seeds(Avoid tea,Coffee)
Food = A bagel(Bread)with smoked salmon,Cream Cheese and Spinach, 2 Wheat roti, 1 Bowl beans,whole grains
Food = Juice of Leafy Vegetables,Dark Chocolate
Food = 1-2 Roti,boiled Potatoes,steamed Broccoli and leaf cabbage
Food = Green Tea, Juice of 5-6 Madagascar Periwinkle(Sadabahar) leaves + 2 Spoon Tomato
Food = 1 bowl of Grapes + Kiwi + Berries
Food = 1 Multigrain Roti, Broccoli, Tomato, Spinach,half bowl Yoghurt
Food = 2 Phulkas, Mushroom vegetable, Spinach, Garlic chutney or half bowl Brown Rice, Vegetable Pulav
Food = Fenugreek seeds in boiled water
Food = Oats,Stuff Methi,2 Eggs,1 cup warm Water with Lemon
Food = Salad(Cucumber+Tomato),2 Phulkas,1 bowl dal,curd,any vegetable
Food = Milk or lemon water or green tea.
Food = Salad, Bajra or Jowar roti,green leafy vegetable.
Food = Boil an Apple,two slices of White Bread.Drink an infusion of Sage leaves
Food = White Rice with a bit of Olive oil.A boiled Apple and two slices of White Bread.Infusion of Sage leaves
Food = A Banana,white bread toast with Blueberry Jam.An Infusion of Chamomile
Food = 2 Plain toasts,Half Bowl Yoghurt,1 Banana
Food = If Required Oat meal otherwise do not eat
Food = Rice,Plain potato Sabji(Avoid chapati,Fried Food)
Food = 2 boiled Eggs or 2 Breads with Apple jam
Food = Warm water with half teaspoon Cumin seeds, Skimmed milk,oats upma
Food = Apple Juice or Orange Juice,5-6 Almonds
Food = Spinach,Broccoli,Mushroom,legumes,1 Wheat Chapati,Half bowl Yoghurt
Food = Any leafy green vegetables,Half bowl Brown Rice,1-2 Chapati
Food = 1 small serving of fruit + Protein 2-3 whole eggs, paneer, protein shake, Upma.
Food = Lean Protein-2-4 egg whites, chicken breast, fish, paneer + Complex Carbohydrate-2 rotis/ bowl of brown rice, upma + Dal + Salad without potato.
Food = Small serving of Complex carb-1 multi grain toast, bowl of upma, oats + Tea/Coffee (with 1 Tsp sugar.
Food = Same as lunch but avoid Carbohydrate. Replace Carb with Salad.
Food = Vegetable poha,1 glass of Buttermilk,5 Soaked almonds
Food = Bowl of salad, Dal, some seasonal cooked vegetables, whole wheat chapati
Food = Sprout chaat or fruit with curd
Food = Bowl of soup or salad, bowl of vegetables,whole wheat chapati
Food = Vegetables Juice,1-Glass coconut Water or Cucumber Juice
Food = 1 bowl Freash seasonal Fruits(avoid bananas).
Food = 2 Chapatis,Any leafy vegetables(Avoid rajma,chana),Half bowl Brown rice
Food = Herbal Tea or Fresh Juice of Any Vegetables,coconut slices(If hungry)
Food = 2 eggs or mushroom omlet or cauliflower toast with avocado ,coconut milk
Food = Tuna salad with celery and tomato,1 bowl cauliflower rice or hard boiled eggs
Food = Coconut chicken curry or zucchini noodles or pork chop with vegetables or grilled salmon with spinach
Food = 2 Brown breads or 2 chapatis or 1 cup oats
Food = Tomato + carrot salad, 1 roti, mix sabji,half bowl dal
Food = 1 cup of tea or coffee with full cream milk and 2 biscuits.
Food = 1 Orange,cereal with milk and sugar,1 boiled egg,whole wheat toast
Half cup soup,meat or fish or poultry,potato or rice,vegetable or salad.
Half cup soup,meat or fish or poultry,potato or rice,vegetable or salad.
